rooms.description: Spacious entrance with wheelchair accessible ramp and tactile guidance system.
Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen, featuring energy-efficient LED lighting and low VOC materials.
Modern open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area, with sustainable appliances and natural light from large windows.
Luxurious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom designed for comfort and accessibility including grab bars in the washroom.
Accessible guest room with natural light and wheelchair friendly design.
Another guest bedroom ensuring ample space and accessibility.

amenities.name: Swimming Pool
amenities.description: Heated eco-friendly swimming pool with solar water heating system and accessible shallow end.

amenities.name: Rooftop Terrace
amenities.description: Sustainable rooftop terrace with green roof features, rainwater harvesting and ample wheelchair access.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with adjoining balcony for additional natural light.
Well-lit guest room ensuring smooth circulation and accessibility.
Accessible guest bedroom with easy access to the staircase.
